Elevate Your Website’s Advertising Success with Our Expert-Led Course and Stand Out in the Digital Landscape.

Our course is tailored to help you understand the essential principles, strategies, and proven techniques required to harness the power of advertising and achieve remarkable results for your website. Whether you own a website and want to attract more customers or aspire to excel in the field of marketing and boost your website’s performance, this course equips you with skills necessary to succeed in digital advertising.

Sign Up Now To Get A 20% Discount

Program Overview

Our Core Advertising Solutions (for Website Owners) course offers comprehensive insights into the fundamental principles, strategies, and proven techniques required to effectively advertise your website and drive desired outcomes. This course covers a diverse range of topics, including website optimization, ad placements, targeting strategies, analytics, and emerging advertising technologies. With this well-rounded knowledge base, participants will gain the skills needed to thrive in the dynamic world of advertising and achieve remarkable results.

  • Target Audience and Buyer Personas

  • Website Optimisation

  • Search Engine Advertising (SEM)

  • Email Marketing

  • Landing pages

  • Ad Placements

  • Display Advertising

  • Analytics

  • Market Research

  • Social Media Advertising for Websites

  • Video Advertising Strategies

  • Compliance and Legal Considerations

LIFE AS A CORE ADVERTISING SOLUTIONS EXPERT

Core advertising solutions experts possess a deep understanding of the advertising landscape and have honed their skills to help website owners maximize their online presence and achieve their business goals.

On a typical day, a Core Advertising Solutions expert starts by staying updated on the latest industry trends and emerging technologies. They analyze data, monitor performance metrics, and make data-driven decisions to optimize advertising campaigns for their clients’ websites. They continually research and experiment with new strategies and techniques to stay ahead of the curve, delivering exceptional results.

These experts are masters of various advertising channels and platforms. They excel in search engine advertising (SEM), employing effective keyword research and ad targeting to drive relevant traffic to websites. They also leverage display advertising, social media advertising, and video advertising, tailoring their approach to suit the unique needs and goals of each website owner.

A Core Advertising Solutions expert understands the importance of website optimization. They meticulously analyze user experience, ensuring that ad placements and landing pages are strategically designed to maximize conversions. They conduct tests, experiment with different creatives, and optimize website performance to ensure a seamless and engaging user journey.

One of the key strengths of these experts is their ability to adapt to changes in the advertising landscape. They stay informed about advertising regulations, guidelines, and best practices, ensuring compliance and ethical advertising practices.

Beyond technical expertise, Core Advertising Solutions experts excel in communication and collaboration. They build strong relationships with their clients, understanding their unique business objectives and tailoring advertising solutions accordingly. They provide regular reports and updates, discussing campaign performance and recommending optimization strategies to achieve even greater results.

In conclusion, the life of a Core Advertising Solutions expert is never dull. They thrive on the fast-paced nature of the industry, embracing challenges and finding innovative solutions to help website owners succeed.

Career Advantages

High demand

With the increasing importance of digital advertising, there is a growing demand for professionals who can effectively navigate the advertising landscape and drive results for businesses. Core Advertising Solutions experts are sought after by companies of all sizes, from startups to multinational corporations, creating a wealth of job opportunities.

Versatility

Core Advertising Solutions experts are versatile professionals who possess a diverse skill set. They are well-versed in various advertising channels, platforms, and technologies, allowing them to work across different industries and sectors. This versatility enables them to adapt to changing trends and take on exciting projects in different domains.

Career Growth

As the digital advertising industry continues to evolve, there are ample opportunities for career growth and advancement for Core Advertising Solutions experts. They can progress from entry-level roles to managerial positions, leading teams and overseeing advertising strategies for larger projects and campaigns. Additionally, they can explore freelance or consulting opportunities, offering their expertise to multiple clients.

Competitive Salaries

Core Advertising Solutions experts command competitive salaries due to their specialized skills and high demand in the job market. Their ability to generate tangible results and drive business growth makes them valuable assets for companies, leading to attractive compensation packages and potential bonuses based on performance.

Entrepreneurial Opportunities

Core Advertising Solutions experts have the potential to leverage their skills and knowledge to establish their own agencies or consulting businesses. With their expertise in driving online success for businesses, they can become trusted advisors and help clients achieve their advertising goals, enjoying the freedom and autonomy of entrepreneurship.

Impactful Work

Core Advertising Solutions experts have the opportunity to make a significant impact on businesses and brands. By effectively optimizing advertising campaigns, increasing website traffic, and driving conversions, they contribute directly to the growth and success of companies. This tangible impact can be highly rewarding and fulfilling.

What career will this programme prepare me for?

  • Digital Advertising Specialist

  • Advertising Account Manager

  • Digital Marketing Manager

  • Marketing Consultant

  • E-commerce Specialist

  • Digital Marketing Analyst

  • Lead generation specialist

  • Conversion Rate Optimization Specialist

There are extra advantages of taking the Core Advertising Solutions course at our institution. You will acquire the skills required for professional success, thanks to our knowledgeable instructors and hands-on learning style as well as the support we offer you every step of the way. Whether you are a beginner or an advanced learner, our curriculum is designed to cater to your needs. Plus, you’ll gain access to abundant resources and be a part of a vibrant community of learners and professionals. With all these resources and support, you’ ll be well on your way to becoming a thriving Advertising Solutions Expert

How You Will Learn

Methods: Virtual and Physical classes, Business case-studies, Virtual projects, and Interactive quizzes.

Physical and Virtual Classes

You will participate in physical and live virtual classes that will provide a platform for discussions, question-and-answer sessions, and feedback. The classes are designed to be interactive, with students encouraged to ask questions and participate in group discussions.

Case Studies

You will have the opportunity to explore real-life examples and case studies from the digital advertising industry. These case studies provide valuable insights and practical experience that you can directly apply to your own work. By analyzing successful advertising campaigns and strategies, you will gain a deeper understanding of how core advertising solutions can be implemented effectively to drive results for websites. These real-world examples will serve as valuable references and sources of inspiration as you navigate the challenges and complexities of the digital advertising landscape.

Projects

You will actively engage in hands-on projects that allow you to apply all you have learned. These projects will involve creating and optimizing diverse advertising campaigns, leveraging your expertise in core advertising solutions. Throughout the process, you will receive guidance and feedback from industry experts, enabling you to refine your skills and strategies. By actively participating in these projects, you will develop the confidence, competence, and practical abilities required to excel in the dynamic and ever-evolving field of digital advertising.

Interactive Quizzes

The program includes interactive quizzes that will test your understanding of the concepts and tools covered in each module. These quizzes are designed to be engaging and will provide instant feedback on the student's performance.

What You Will Learn

Our course is prepared to equip you with the essential knowledge and skills needed to thrive in Web Advertising Solutions. Through 12 comprehensive modules, you will embark on a captivating learning journey that explores various facets of effective advertising strategies for the web.

By the end of the course, you will emerge as an expert capable of creating, managing, and promoting successful initiatives aimed at acquiring and converting customers. The in-depth understanding and practical expertise gained throughout the course will empower you to navigate the ever-changing landscape of digital advertising with confidence and achieve remarkable results for your clients or your own business.

Here is what you will learn:

  • Module 1
  • Module 2
  • Module 3
  • Module 4
  • Module 5
  • Module 6
  • Module 7
  • Module 8
  • Module 9
  • Module 10
  • Module 11
  • Module 12

Staying updated and adapting to changes in the advertising landscape

Class Requirements

  • 4-8 weeks, 11-12 hours/week

  • Access to a laptop or desktop computer with a minimum of 4gig ram, and 256g SSD or 500g HDD Rom.

  • Access to a stable internet connection

  • Proficiency in written and spoken English

Testimonials

My job was one of the things that took a hit during the pandemic. I was devastated by this but a respected senior friend convinced me to go and improve my skills at PDMA so I'd be indispensable. He wasn't wrong. In 4 short weeks, the improvement was so obvious and profound that Lagos Business School approached me. In a very short while, using what I learned at PDMA, I did not just land a job, I rose to Manager ranks at Lagos Business School. Looking back, I am glad the last job ended...but I am most glad I went to PDMA.
Toba OlugosiClient Relationship Manager, Lagos Business School
After graduating from University, I knew needed digital skills if this economy was going to favor me. It didn’t take long to find PDMA, and I am glad I did. My experience at PDMA positioned me to land a job right after my graduation where I manage local international brands…it didn’t even take time to happen. I am really happy cos truly when you weigh it against the value you get, PDMA is just doing giveaways to help people like me get their lives started. PDMA Should Charge More
Ifeoluwa IsraelContent Writer
I AM DOING WELL! I loved marketing, the only problem was I didn't know how to do it. I knew I had to start from somewhere and I am glad I started from PDMA. PDMA started from the basics of marketing before we went into digital marketing and that was my eureka moment. I would have just known the tools and been totally clueless about converting customers. Today, I am the lead strategist for several multination brands and I can't even lie, PDMA laid the foundation for this career I am enjoying today.
Benjamin IkadeCreative Strategist, Xpark360

Frequently Asked Questions

WHAT IS DIGITAL MARKETING?

Digital marketing means using the internet and digital tools to promote products, services, and brands. It's about getting more people to know about a business and trust it by sharing ads and helpful content to bring in new customers and keep the current ones happy.

HOW MUCH DOES DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING COST IN LAGOS?

Digital marketing courses are reasonably priced, and the cost may differ depending on the institute. With a budget ranging from 150,000 to 300,000, you can acquire valuable digital marketing skills.

WHAT IF I AM NOT CLOSE TO THE VENUE OF THE TRAINING?

If you live far from the training location and can't come to class regularly, you can use our online platform. It lets you learn at your own speed and convenience. Visit pdmaonline.com to learn more about our digital marketing courses online.

WHICH CERTIFICATION IS THE BEST?

There are several good certifications for digital marketing, including:Premium Digital Marketing Academy Certification, Facebook Blueprint Certification, Google Analytics IQ Certification, Hootsuite Social Marketing Certification, Google Ads Certification, Zeo Digital Academy, Chartered Institute of Social Media Marketing and Digital Marketing, etc. 

WHAT DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING DOES PDMA OFFER?

PDMA offers several digital marketing training programs, including in-class training, corporate training, and online training.

HOW MUCH DOES DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING COST IN NIGERIA?

The cost of a digital marketing course in Nigeria can vary depending on the academy, but you should budget between 100,000 to 300,000 Naira.

CAN THE PAYMENTS BE DONE IN INSTALLMENTS FOR YOUR DIGITAL MARKETING COURSE?

Yes, you can make payments in installments for our digital marketing course, but the full payment should be completed before the class ends.

IS THERE A CERTIFICATE AT THE END OF THE DIGITAL MARKETING PROGRAM?

Yes. Upon completion of the digital marketing training, you will receive a certificate. Additionally, PDMA will guide you on how to obtain certifications from Google, HubSpot, and other relevant international digital marketing certification bodies

Our training programs include: In-class training, Corporate training, and Online training



WHAT DOES A DIGITAL MARKETING COURSE COST IN NIGERIA?

The cost of a digital marketing course can vary depending on the academy. In Nigeria, you should budget between 100,000 to 300,000 Naira.

CAN I PAY FOR YOUR DIGITAL MARKETING COURSE IN INSTALLMENTS?

Yes, you can pay in installments, but please ensure full payment is made before the class ends.

DO I RECEIVE A CERTIFICATE AFTER COMPLETING THE DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING?

Absolutely, you'll receive a certificate once you finish the course, including all assignments and projects. We'll even assist you in obtaining certifications from Google, HubSpot, and other important international digital marketing bodies.

WHAT DIGITAL MARKETING COURSES ARE INCLUDED IN THE PROGRAM?

Our curriculum covers a wide range of courses, including: Online Marketing Strategy, Lead Generation, Sales Conversion, and Website Credibility, Web Design (WordPress),  Email Marketing, Fundamentals of Graphic Design, Google Analytics, Content Marketing/Copywriting, Social Media Marketing, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), and Search Engine Marketing (SEM).

ARE THESE DIGITAL MARKETING COURSES INCLUDED IN THE PACKAGE?

Yes. When you enroll, you'll receive training in all these courses. However, if you prefer to specialize in just one or a few of these courses, we offer customized packages to meet your specific needs.
